20. In addition to ESRS 2 MDR-A, the undertaking may specify whether and how an action and
resources cover:
(a) higher levels of resource efficiency in use of technical and biological materials and
water, particularly in relation to critical raw materials and rare earths as listed in the
Raw Materials Information System;
